[yen→], ผมชอบกินน้ำเย็น. [phohm↗ chaawp↘ gin→ naam↑ yen→] : I like to drink cold water.

[maak↘], ขอบคุณมาก [khaawp↓ khoon→ maak↘] : Thanks a lot.
